name: @dome/cli
description: Terminal UI client for the dome API

scripts.tui:custom: node -e "require('child_process').execSync('node dist/index.js config set --base-url ' + process.argv[1], {stdio: 'inherit'}); require('child_process').execSync('node dist/index.js tui', {stdio: 'inherit'});"
scripts.tui:local: node -e "require('child_process').execSync('node dist/index.js config set --base-url http://localhost:8787', {stdio: 'inherit'}); require('child_process').execSync('node dist/index.js tui', {stdio: 'inherit'});"
scripts.tui:url: node -e "if (process.argv[1]) { require('child_process').execSync('node dist/index.js config set --base-url ' + process.argv[1], {stdio: 'inherit'}); } require('child_process').execSync('node dist/index.js tui', {stdio: 'inherit'});"
